Aggregate Replicates

Source: R/methods-aggregateReplicates.R
aggregateReplicates.Rd

Aggregate Replicates

# S4 method for bcbioSingleCell
aggregateReplicates(object)

Arguments

object

Object.

See also

Other Data Functions: cell2sample, counts, fetchGeneData, fetchPCAData, fetchTSNEData, fetchTSNEExpressionData, filterCells, mapCellsToSamples, metricsPerSample, metrics, selectSamples, subsetPerSample, topBarcodes

Examples

# bcbioSingleCell ====
x <- aggregateReplicates(bcb_small)
#> New sample IDs: sample
#> Remapping cellular barcodes to aggregate sample IDs
#> Aggregating counts
#> Calculating cellular barcode metrics
#> 500 cells detected
#> 449 coding genes detected
#> 13 mitochondrial genes detected
#> 500 cellular barcodes passed pre-filtering (100%)
#> Updating metadata
sampleData(x)
#> DataFrame with 1 row and 4 columns
#>        sampleID sampleName description interestingGroups
#>        <factor>   <factor>    <factor>          <factor>
#> sample   sample     sample      sample            sample
